name: Bronze
label: Basic
description: A quick, affordable option for light upkeep. Ideal for tidy homes needing just a quick refresh.

name: Silver
label: Standard
description: Great for regular cleaning and upkeep. Balances cost and cleanliness with more time spent than Bronze.

name: Gold
label: Premium
description: Perfect for deep cleaning, first-time cleans, or clients who want every detail attended to. Expect a spotless shine and the highest attention to detail.
